DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study compare efficacy safety GW685698X 100mcg daily ( QD ) aqueous nasal spray vehicle placebo nasal spray adult adolescent subject ( 12 year age old ) vasomotor rhinitis ( VMR ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of Adults And Adolescents With Vasomotor Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Must outpatient . Diagnosis VMR . Literate English native language . Exclusion criterion : Significant concomitant medical condition . Use corticosteroid allergy medication study . Used tobacco product within past year .
